text: Isadore Manuel Singer (May 3, 1924 - February 11, 2021) was an American mathematician. He was an Institute Professor in the Department of Mathematics at the Massachusetts Institute of Technology and a Professor Emeritus of Mathematics at the University of California, Berkeley. Singer was known for his work with Michael Atiyah proving the Atiyahâ€“Singer index theorem in 1962,. Singer died on February 11, 2021 at his home in Boxborough, Massachusetts at the age of 96.Isadore M.
